By The_Onyx_Knight on Thursday, May 27, 2010 - 05:54 am:

To prevent people from going to Gamestop on 7/20/10 and making them upset because it's not in yet I would like to mention that this date is only the shipping date, it will probably NOT be in until 7/21/10, so call the store you reserved it at first to see if it is in yet.

By fiffa46 on Thursday, May 27, 2010 - 08:43 pm:

Gamestop has an automated system that will call you the night before it releases. If you didn't get the call, it's not going to be in. And yes, Gamestop does have a nasty habit of listing the ship date and not the actual release date.
